description: This is a family favourite traditional Irish bread, perfect for soups, salads, cheese, breakfast, lunch or dinner. Simple to make and versatile.
keywords: Bread,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Irish Wheaten Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â° (with fan). Put all the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix well.
Add the buttermilk and oil and mix for a few minutes until the mixture has the consistency of a thick porridge.
Pour the mix into a greased baking tin or silicone mold evenly and sprinkle the top with coarse brown flour/wholemeal.
When oven is ready place the loaf and bake for 50 minutes.
Once baked remove loaf and place upside down on a cooling rack covered with a damp tea towel or cloth (damp not wet). Allow the loaf 20 minutes to rest before serving.
